DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect `` High Protein Atkin 's Complete ( lacto ) VEgetaRian Diet ( Acronym ; 'PACER ' diet ) weight , body composition metabolic profile obese Asian Indians subject live north India .
DOC.brief_title: High Protein Atkin 's Complete ( Lacto ) VEgetaRian Diet ( PACER ) Weight Loss
DOC.detailed_description: Increasing protein consumption promotes weight loss several mechanism . Diets high protein promote energy expenditure increase postprandial thermogenesis , increase total daily expenditure increase satiety compare carbohydrate . The present study aim evaluate effect `` High Protein Atkin 's Complete ( lacto ) VEgetaRian Diet ( Acronym ; 'PACER ' diet ) weight , body composition metabolic profile obese Asian Indians subject live north India .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age 25 60 year Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 25 kg/m2 40 kg/m2 Subjects stable weight , i.e . ± 3 kg variation weight level 3 month prior screen study . Absence significant disease clinically significant medical history physical examination screen view investigator . Subjects willing provide write inform consent participate study . Exclusion Criteria Body mass index ( BMI ) > 40 kg/m2 Any patient taking/requiring drug know effect insulin resistance , lipid , vascular reactivity , intervention period would exclude study Patients drug change weight condition dietary protein supplementation contraindicate Subjects consume high protein diet randomization , exclude Acute infection chronic debilitate disease like tuberculosis , malignancy , HIV infection etc Any life threaten serious disorder liver , kidney , heart , lung organ Pregnancy & lactation Patients diagnose follow : Type 2 diabetes mellitus Cushing 's disease Severe end organ damage Unwillingness give write informed consent participation study
